svg.text: 1. User sends message → Frontend Components (ChatInterface, ChatMessages)
3. API checks Response Cache (if cached, return immediately)
4. API loads Conversation History from MongoDB (last 5 messages)
5. API checks if PYQ query → Queries PYQ Database directly
7. API calls Perplexity AI (sonar-pro model) with optimized system prompt
8. Response streams back (SSE) or returns JSON
10. Message saved to Chat Collection in MongoDB
3. Priority: Azure Translator → AI Models → Google Translate → Free Services
4. Response cached and returned to frontend
• Response Caching (10 min TTL) - Reduces API calls by ~70%
• Optimized System Prompt (90% reduction from 4000 to 50 tokens)
• Limited Conversation History (5 messages instead of 10)
• PYQ Query Limits (max 50 items instead of 500)
• Single API Call (removed double parallel calls)
• Chat: {_id, userEmail, name, messages[], settings, lastMessageAt, createdAt}
• PYQ: {exam, level, paper, year, question, topicTags[], sourceLink, verified}
English, Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, Bengali, Punjabi, Gujarati, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Spanish
